name: Bouncing In The Dark EP1
description:
Bouncing In The Dark EP1 is an atmospheric single player platformer game. You play as a bouncy creature who finds himself in an unknown place deep underground and so it decides to find the way out.

Discover beautiful atmospheric underground caves full of different creatures. Collect colorful keys to unlock your further way and be careful of traps and monsters.

Game was created divided in separate episodes. Enjoy first one and if you like expect next very soon.

Controls:

a,d or arrows keys to move.

space or arrow key "up" to jump.

tab to show collected keys.

enter/space and arrow keys for action and selecting in main menu.

You can turn off/on music in game by pressing "m" key.

Go back to main menu by pressing "Esc" button.
